---
title: "Carrot & lentil soup"
author: "James Edwards"
categories: [soup]
description: "My standard winter soup. Nice with coriander and a drizzle of oil"
---

* 600g peeled carrots
* 200g red lentils
* 1 stick celery
* 1 onion
* Chunk ginger
* 2 garlic cloves
* 2 tsp cumin seeds
* 1/2 tsp turmeric and coriander
* Atleast 1L water
* Fresh coriander

1. Fry seeds
1. Add onion, garlic, ginger
1. Add celery and lentils
1. Add stock
1. Simmer for 30 min
1. Blend
